divs: sighting detailsdriving home from a sober dance on new years eve i saw in the sky four objects that were basically yellow\orangelights. one light was alone to the left of three others. as i looked back and forth from my car window the three objects got together in a straight line. i reached my house and ran in to get the dog to take out . it took me no more than a couple of minutes but when i looked up in the sky it was clouded over with rows of rippled clouds? i had never before seen anything like this and it seemed very suspicious that the clouds appeared all of a sudden. there was no wind to cause such a fast cover.
Summary: sighting of four unknown glowing objects on new years eve
trends: There have been 105 other sightings in Tampa
There was one other sighting in Tampa on or around January 1st 2013
